title: pelimies
author: pelimies
content: Hey Bois, listen up! We're embarking on an epic journey into the heart of the crypto battleground.Why $BOIS?This ain't your run-of-the-mill crypto move; $BOIS is our powerhouse, a brotherhood of alpha bois hustling to make it big. Picture gains so intense, they make your protien shakes jealous. The Boi Code isn't just a guideline; it's our manifesto â€“ lifting, trading, clapping cheeks and owning markets without a shred of FUD.Mibois NFT Collection: Echoing Milady's LegacyHold tight, because Mibois is emerging as the NFT titan, a 1:1 mirror to the legendary Milady's collection. We're not talking mini here; it's a megastar in the making, following the footsteps of MAYC and Lil'Pudgy.Why the Bullish Vibes?Think strategic moves like Bored Ape Yacht Club and Pudgy Penguins. Now, envision the colossal Milady's birthing the Mibois collection. It's not just a reflection; it's a disruptive force. Whether you're a boi or just vibing with the hype, this is your ticket to salvation.Seize the Momentum, Ride the Wave with Your Bois!This isn't a solo journey; it's a rallying cry to all bois seeking alpha opportunities. Invest in $BOIS for gains that resonate in the halls of Wall Street's nightmares. Join the Mibois NFT Collection and be part of a movement where every boi is destined for greatness.Dext: https://www.dextools.io/app/en/ether/pair-explorer/0xfd293e7735c6b1ce64a1db52c386a43aca6e4f96Twitter: https://twitter.com/mibois2024?s=21&t=AG7pHeFm80cbzfQqWQR4bATG: https://t.me/MIBOISPORTALWebsite: https://mibois.club/

comments.body: must be gay bois.why eth??gas fee is HORRIBLEthere are better options than spending so much on fees...

comments.author: Xal0lex
comments.body: Quote from: IFalco on November 28, 2023, 10:48:29 PMMen actually live longer than women, biologically speaking we're supposed to.But since we work ten times harder in this society, must men die of a heart attack, younger than they should be.There is a reason women age terribly, while men just get stronger and better looking after their 30'sA woman ends up looking like a fat ape with makeup and a wig.You're wrong, just the opposite. All over the world, women live longer than men, that's a fact. And there are many reasons for that. Read, for example, UN reports on life expectancy on Earth and you will see for yourself that you are wrong. Plus on the Internet you will find statistics that prove the opposite.

comments.body: Quote from: MiningCoinsPool on November 29, 2023, 03:39:32 PMIn a feminist word, if you start to believe false statistics then you're not really smart, sorry bro. You're either a simp or an idiot to this point.Oh, another conspirologist who believes in a worldwide conspiracy  Are you saying it's a false statistic? What statistic is not false then? Well, drop a link and provide a NOT false statistic that you trust. Very interesting to see it. And we'll see which one of us is which.
